name: Dual Wielder
flavor: You fight best with a weapon in either hand, allowing you to create a barrage of unavoidable strikes.

stances.name: Dual Weapon Style
stances.desc: Each of your weapons darts back and forth as if with a mind of its own, allowing you to strike with uncanny speed.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you strike an enemy with both of your Wielded Weapons in the same Round, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Making additional Strikes in a Round costs half as much, so long as all Strikes have the Weapon Keyword and use a different Weapon, or make use of multiple Weapons for the Strike.

techniques.name: Second Blade
techniques.desc: No matter how a foe attempts to evade your strikes, you always have a second weapon to catch them.
techniques.reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
techniques.trigger: A creature uses an Evade Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
techniques.effect: Immediately use Quick Strike as a Reaction, using the Weapon not used for the triggering Strike.

techniques.name: Dual Strike
techniques.desc: A vicious attack, striking with two weapons in quick succession.
techniques.reqs: Separate Light or Versatile One-Handed Weapons Wielded in either hand.
techniques.effect: Immediately use the Quick Strike Action twice, using a different weapon for each Strike and declaring what weapon is being used before rolling the attack. The Damage from these Strikes is halved.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_. You may use the faster of the two Wielded Weapons to determine Speed.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. After rolling your first Attack, you may change which weapon it is using, so long as the target is within Range of the new weapon.

name: Duelist
flavor: You always keep one hand free in combat, providing you a flexibility and fluidity that few can match.

techniques.name: Offensive Flourish
techniques.desc: You disengage your weapon with an offensive flourish, catching nearby foes off-guard.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
techniques.effect: Deal Damage to a creature within Range equal to half the damage you dealt with the Attached Strike. Gain 1 _Momentum_.

techniques.name: Defensive Flourish
techniques.desc: You disengage your weapon with a defensive flourish, easily flowing back into a defensive stance.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
techniques.effect: If you _Graze_ with the Attached Strike, gain any two of _Grit_ or _Reflex_. If you _Hit_,  instead any three. If you _Crit_,  instead any four.

techniques.name: Mobile Flourish
techniques.desc: You disengage your weapon with a darting flourish, disengaging and slipping away from foes.
techniques.reqs: Must be attached to a Weapon Strike made while only Wielding a One-Handed Weapon.
techniques.effect: If you _Hit_ or _Crit_ with the Attached Strike, gain 1 _Reflex_.

name: Grappler
flavor: So long as you have a hand free you'll have an opponent in it, dragging them about the battlefield.

stances.name: Crush Grip
stances.desc: You maintain a painful hold on foes, slowly crushing them while they're grappled.
stances.accumulate: Every time you defeat a creature you have _Grappled_, gain 3 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: At the start of each of you _Turns_ where you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_ you may make a Basic Strike using the Slam Weapon against a single creature that is a _Bottom_ in the same _Grapple_. On a _Hit_ or _Crit_, gain 1 _Grit_.

stances.name: Living Shield
stances.desc: You pass on a more conventional shield, instead using a creature held in your grasp to defend against attacks.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you use a Reaction that requires you be the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
stances.effect: While you have a creature _Grappled_ increase your _Guard_ by 1 for the remainder of the Turn whenever you use a _Block_ Reaction that requires you be the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.

stances.name: Lockdown
stances.desc: When you grapple a foe you give them your full attention, shrinking the battlefield for the two of you.
stances.accumulate: Gain 1 _Momentum_ every time you Attack a creature you are _Grappling_.
stances.effect: While you have a creature _Grappled_ you and the _Grappled_ creature have _Disadvantage_ on all Attacks against other creatures. Whenever you make an Attack against a creature you have _Grappled_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to have _Advantage_ on the Attack.

techniques.name: Grappling Strike
techniques.desc: You follow up an unarmed strike with an attempted grab to restrain a foe.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_ or _Grit_ if not using an Unarmed Weapon.
techniques.effect: Attack using your weapon's _Profile_. After resolving the Attack, use the Grab Maneuver. If you _Hit_ with the initial Attack, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Grab by 1. If you _Crit_,  instead increase it by 2.

techniques.name: Suplex
techniques.desc: You viciously flip a grappled creature for a devastating blow.
techniques.effect: Immediately _Move_ the _Bottom_ in the _Grapple_ to the opposite side of yourself and Attack them with the below _Profile_. The _Bottom_ may spend 2 _Grit_ before you make the attack to _Negate_; if they do, do not Move them and they take half Damage from the Attack.
techniques.special: You  may choose to end the _Grapple_ as a part of this Attack. If you do, increase the cost to _Negate_ the Attack by 1 and increase the Damage by 1.

techniques.name: Grappling Swing
techniques.desc: You slam a creature you have grappled into another, using them as a clumsy weapon.
techniques.reqs: Must be _Top_ in a _Grapple_ against a Size 1 or smaller creature.
techniques.effect: You may _Pull_ 3 (2 _Grit_) on the _Grappled_ creature. Attack using the Medium Improvised Weapon's _Profile_, resolving the Attack is if it originates from the _Grappled_ creature's space. Resolve the Attack against the _Grappled_ target as well.

techniques.name: Lock
techniques.desc: You secure your grip on a grappled creature, limiting their ability to fight.
techniques.effect: Choose one of the _Bottoms_ Hands. Unless they spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, they may not use that Hand for the remainder of the _Grapple_. Increase the _Cost_ of all _Reactions_ for that creature by 1 for the remainder of the _Grapple_.
techniques.special: You may not use this Technique on the same _Grappled_ creature more than once unless you are using both Hands for the _Grapple_. If you are, you may use this Technique twice on the same creature.

techniques.name: Wrench
techniques.desc: You violently twist a grappled creature's appendage, attempting to tear their weapon away.

techniques.name: Pin
techniques.desc: You take a grapple to the ground, harshly limiting a foe's mobility.
techniques.effect: For as long as the creature remains _Grappled_, they are _Restrained_, and your cost to _Negate_ the creature escaping the _Grapple_ is reduced by 1. The target creature may spend 2 _Grit_ to _Negate_ this effect, but they remain _Grappled_. While this effect persists you are _Stuck_. You may end this effect at the end of any of your _Turns_.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: While the creature is under this effect, you may maintain the _Grapple_ without using any Hands.

techniques.name: Throw
techniques.desc: You attempt to fling a grappled character away, creating as much space as possible.
techniques.effect: End the _Grapple_. _Push_ 2 the _Grappled_ creature, then inflict _Prone_ (2 _Reflex_) and deal 4 Damage. If the creature _Negates_ they take no Damage.
techniques.special: If you _Push_ the creature into an Obstacle, deal an additional 2 Damage.

techniques.name: Ablative Antagonist
techniques.desc: You attempt to block an attack using a grappled creature, giving your foe a difficult choice.
techniques.trigger: You are Attacked with a Single-Target Attack while you are the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
techniques.effect: The Attacker must choose: Either resolve the Attack against both you and the _Bottom_, dealing half Damage to both and reducing the cost to _Negate_ by 1 or reduce the Attack Roll by 3.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: You choose which Effect to use instead of the Attacker.

techniques.name: Interposing Body
techniques.desc: You reposition a grappled target, forcing them between a foe and yourself.
techniques.trigger: You start a _Phase_ as the _Top_ in a _Grapple_.
techniques.effect: Create an Arc 3 adjacent to you, with a creature you have _Grappled_ and are the _Top_ in at the center. Any Attack that originates from or passes through these spaces takes a -1 penalty to the Attack Roll if Melee or treats you as if you have Cover if Ranged. On a _Miss_, the _Grappled_ creature takes 2 Damage. This effect persists until the end of the current _Phase_ or until you are no longer _Top_ in the _Grapple_.
techniques.boost: X _Grit_: You may _Pull_ the _Grappled_ creature X before resolving this effect. They may spend X+1 _Grit_ to _Negate_.

name: Heavy Weapon Master
flavor: A lesser warrior is controlled by the heavy weight of a large weapon; you have mastered it and honed it into a deadly pendulum.

stances.name: Executioner Style
stances.desc: Like wheat before a scythe, so are foes before your great weapon.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you defeat an enemy with a Heavy Melee Weapon, gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: When you defeat an enemy with a Heavy Melee Weapon you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to deal damage to a creature within your Weapon's reach equal to any excess damage dealt to the defeated creature. This creature may pay 1 _Reflex_ to halve this damage, or 2 _Reflex_ to negate it. You may continue paying _Momentum_ to repeat this effect until there is no Damage remaining.

techniques.name: Shieldbreaker
techniques.reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
techniques.desc: You bring your weapon down in a vicious blow, tearing a foe's defenses asunder.
techniques.effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile. Add _Pierce_ 2 to the Attack.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_: Also resolve this Attack against the Target's Armor or Shield using the original roll. This Boost has no Cost if the Target uses a Block Reaction.

techniques.name: Cleaving Strike
techniques.reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
techniques.desc: You swing your weapon in a mighty arc, potentially striking through multiple foes.
techniques.effect: Attack with your Weapon's Profile in the Area.

techniques.name: Pommel Strike
techniques.reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded
techniques.desc: You quickly attack with the base of your weapon, knocking a foe off-balance.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Momentum_. Speed is instead Set-Up, and the Cost to Negate is increased by 1.

techniques.name: Power Through
techniques.desc: Attempting to block your weapon is one of the greatest acts of folly imaginable.
techniques.reqs: _Heavy_ One or Two-Handed Melee Weapon Wielded.
techniques.trigger: A Size 1 creature uses a _Block_ Reaction against a Weapon Strike.
techniques.effect: The triggering creature must immediately pay 1 _Grit_ or be _Push_ed 2 and knocked _Prone_. They may pay 1 _Grit_ to Negate this, but you may immediately repeat this Reaction against them as long as you can pay the Cost.
techniques.boost: 1 _Grit_: Change the Trigger to say 'A Size 2 creature'.

name: Sentry
flavor: You make use a lighter ranged weapon to punish foes you catch out of cover and provide harrying support to allies.

name: Sniper
flavor: You find a safe position then rain death from above at extreme range, somehow always striking a vital point.
